Class BaseDatabaseTest

java.lang.Object
database.BaseDatabaseTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminRequestsTest, AnnouncementsTest, AnswersTest, PrivateMessagesTest, QuestionsTest, ReadMessagesTest, ReviewerRequestsTest, ReviewsTest, StaffMessagesTest, UsersTest
public abstract class BaseDatabaseTest extends Object
Base test class that sets up an in-memory H2 database for testing.

Each test class that requires a shared in-memory database environment should extend this class. This setup ensures consistent schema initialization and teardown for all tests.

The database URL is set to "jdbc:h2:mem:TestDb;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1;DB_CLOSE_ON_EXIT=FALSE" to ensure the database remains active for the entire test lifecycle.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Method Details

    • setupDatabase

      @BeforeAll public static void setupDatabase() throws SQLException
      Initializes the in-memory database before all tests. Sets up a clean database environment by resetting connections, clearing previous data, and ensuring the schema is initialized properly.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during database initialization.

    • tearDownDatabase

      @AfterAll public static void tearDownDatabase() throws SQLException
      Cleans up the in-memory database after all tests. Ensures the database is cleared and all connections are closed properly.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error during database cleanup.
